Headline: Bus Substitution Between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Shuttle buses replace Blue Line service between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Shuttle buses replace rail service between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted.

Trains will run between O’Hare and UIC-Halsted, and between Forest Park and Illinois Medical District.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
We are performing construction at the Racine Blue Line station and Morgan substation.

Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Morgan/Harrison
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Morgan/Harrison, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Morgan/Harrison, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson,  Racine, Harrison, Jefferson, Jackson, and resume normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Adams, Des Plaines, Harrison, Racine, Van Buren, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Reroute near Columbus/Illinois
ShortDescription: 124 Navy Pier buses temp. rerouted SB: Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, Michigan and Adams; NB Michigan, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois: near Columbus/Illinois..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Columbus/Illinois due to a Marathon near Columbus/Illinois.

Southbound buses will operate via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario, Michigan and Adams including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #84 Peterson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Eastbound 84 Peterson buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Broadway, Berwyn, Sheridan and Bryn Mawr: due to, a Marathon near Lake Shore Drive/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #84 Peterson buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Broadway, Berwyn, Sheridan and Bryn Mawr: due to, a Marathon near Lake Shore Drive/Bryn Mawr.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
